Title: IV.
Writer: Jonathan E. Steinberg (creator), Robert Levine (creator), Brad Kane
Actors: Toby Stephens, Hannah New, Luke Arnold, Jessica Parker Kennedy
Plot: An undertaking by The Walrus crew ends in disaster. Silver warns Flint about Billy. Rackham and Bonny try to regain their livelihood. Eleanor needs help from her father. A figure from Vane's past pays a visit.
